sentences.sContent: He even produced the White House concert in celebration of jazz musician Duke Ellington's seventieth birthday in nineteen sixty-nine.
sentences.sContent_eng: He even produced the White House concert in celebration of jazz musician Duke Ellington's seventieth birthday in nineteen sixty-nine.
sentences.sCn: 1969年，他甚至在白宫主办了一次音乐会，纪念爵士音乐家杜克.埃林顿七十岁诞辰。

sentences.sContent: a democracy that produced Socrates and allowed him to philosophize freely until his seventieth year.
sentences.sContent_eng: a democracy that produced Socrates and allowed him to philosophize freely until his seventieth year.
sentences.sCn: 毕竟是民主哺育了苏格拉底,并允许他自由地进行哲思,直到他七十岁为止。

sentences.sContent: Tyler was past his seventieth birthday when his 15th child was born.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tyler was past his seventieth birthday when his 15th child was born.
sentences.sCn: 泰勒总统七十岁生日时，他第十五个孩子降生了。

words.tran: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的
第十七的，第十七个的；十七分之一的
七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代

trans.tranCn: 第七十的；七十分之一的
